iously processed.=A0 Is this the case?=A0 The processing to me sounds like =
audio-cleanup processing, based on the amount of audio pixelation it seems =
to have introduced, some rather severe?=A0 

However, I didn't hear anythin=
g in any of these other than noise.=A0 Is there anything particular you wan=
ted to highlight?=A0 Were you looking for any input?

 think in your original experimental specs, you request five 30 second audi=

ust the best?

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><br>On going through them all, I think I see now that you did not post 12 samples.  You posted perhaps four, with 2 or 3 duplicates as they've been variously processed.  Is this the case?  The processing to me sounds like audio-cleanup processing, based on the amount of audio pixelation it seems to have introduced, some rather severe?  <br><br>However, I didn't hear anything in any of these other than noise.  Is there anything particular you wanted to highlight?  Were you looking for any input?<br><br><br>--- On <b>Sun, 12/28/08, Rj <i><rasterer@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;"><br>From: Rj <rasterer@...><br>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Audio files from my impact point ITC sessions<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date:
